Introduction
This topic contains award information for the special allowance under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a), including
general information for a special allowance award under 38 US.C. 1312(a)
, and
determining the ending dates for awards involving a child or children
new awards under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
, and
entering award data for a running award under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D - Authorization and Notification for the Special Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D
